full_summary:
# Forklift and Ancillary Items Tender Announcement

## Government Tender Notice

### Reference Information

* Tender Title: Forklift and Ancillary Items
* Tender Reference Number: 5000076065R
* Amendment Number: 3
* Solicitation Number: None provided
* Publication Date: 2024-01-18
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-02-01T14:00:00

### Contracting Entity Information

* Contracting Authority: Environment and Climate Change Canada
* Contracting Authority Address: 45 Alderney Drive, Dartmouth, NS B2Y 2N6, Canada

### Notice Description

Forklift and Ancillary Items Tender Announcement

Environment and Climate Change Canada has issued a request for proposals for the procurement of one (1) forklift and ancillary items. This procurement process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A.

### Bid Solicitation Process

* Procurement Method: Competitive – Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: 2024-02-01T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-02-09
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-06-01

### Contracting Authority Information

* Contracting Authority: Samantha Walerickton
* Contracting Authority Email: [samantha.walerickton@ec.gc.ca](mailto:samantha.walerickton@ec.gc.ca)
* Contracting Authority Telephone: (902) 920-4445

### Attachment

* Tender Notice: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29746/5000076065r_nor_en.pdf (English)
* Tender Notice: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29746/5000076065r_ndb_fr_0.pdf (French)

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Samantha Walerickton at samantha.walerickton@ec.gc.ca or (902) 920-4445. End of notice. 

Please let me know if I can assist you further.

Here is the reference list, if you need any further information or quotes
